title: Peter Brandt on Bitcoin Bull Market: My Bet Is This Is a ‘Starting’ Candle
description: Veteran trader and renowned chartist Peter Brandt has doubled down on his bullish outlook for bitcoin. After raising his bitcoin price target for this bull market cycle to $200K, Brandt pointed to “huge monthly bars” on his bitcoin price chart, stating: “My bet is that this is a ‘starting’ candle.” Peter Brandt’s Bitcoin Bull Run […]

title: Google CEO Sundar Pichai Faces Calls for Resignation Amid AI Competition Concerns
description: Amidst the fierce competition in the tech industry’s AI landscape, analysts and insiders are increasingly vocal about their doubts regarding Google CEO Sundar Pichai’s leadership amidst AI competition. As Alphabet Inc.’s Google faces challenges in maintaining innovation speed and competing in the AI sphere, discussions about Pichai’s tenure at the helm of the tech giant […]
